activities: Boston Scientific, including its subsidiaries and affiliates, is a worldwide developer, manufacturer and marketer of medical devices with approximately 25,000 employees. Boston Scientific's mission is to improve the quality of patient care and the productivity of health care delivery through the development and advocacy of less-invasive medical devices and procedures. To accomplish this mission, Boston Scientific processes patient demographic, medical, device and clinical trials personal data along with team member personal data. The scope of this certification includes all Boston Scientific divisions, namely, Cardiac Rhythm Management (CRM), Interventional Cardiology (IC), Electrophysiology, Peripheral Intervention (PI) and Medical Surgery (MedSurg) which includes  Neuromodulation, Endoscopy and Urology and Women’s Health.
